definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The leading group is to move back at5 minutes' notice.
sentences.chinese: 先头小组何时返回，提前五分钟通知。

sentences.english: Certainly the German spearheads were very close.
sentences.chinese: 德国的先头部队一定相距很近。

sentences.english: And yet, we insist upon the word, people were always welcome there.
sentences.chinese: 但是，正如我们先头说过，顾客始终是受到欢迎的。

sentences.english: Our advance forces encountered a squad of enemy patrols.
sentences.chinese: 我军的先头部队和敌军的一个班巡逻兵遭遇。

sentences.english: The noise which he had heard was the trampling of the horse's hoofs on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 他先头听见的便是马蹄踏地的响声。

sentences.english: Dusk, Egypt Legion spearheads Gupta arrived to join the fighting.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时分，埃及普塔军团先头部队赶到，加入战斗。

sentences.english: The advance detachment has engaged the enemy.
Her hands, which she had wet in drawing the water, felt cold;
sentences.chinese: 她开始感得手冷，那是先头在取水时弄湿的。

sentences.english: I said to myself, `The moon is bright: it is going to freeze.
sentences.chinese: 我先头在想，月亮这么明，快下霜了。

sentences.english: We are the advance detachment. The main forces will be here soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们是先头部队，大军随后就到。

sentences.english: Jean Valjean had already forgotten the means which he had employed to make Cosette keep silent.
sentences.chinese: 冉阿让早已忘了他先头用来噤住珂赛特的方法。

sentences.english: Soon, panzer spearheads were closing around their prey.
sentences.chinese: 很快，装甲先头部队就从周围接近了他们的猎物。

sentences.english: Did you see a gun aimed at you?
sentences.chinese: 您先头没有看见有杆枪对着您瞄准吗？

sentences.english: No one forced him to indulge the false glamour of the weed.
sentences.chinese: 我军的先头部队和敌军的一个班巡逻兵遭遇。

definition: to garrison/to stand guard/on garrison duty
to receive orders/to follow orders/to act under orders
to set out (of troops)/departure/start date (of military expedition)
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
to flee in disorder/defeated and in rout
